document.full_text: 'puma,' having its premiere at the new jersey repertory company in long branch, takes a melodramatic look at the four-decade relationship between marlene dietrich and erich maria remarque.
document.title: theater review | new jersey: 4 decades spent romancing dietrich
lines_and_colors: 'puma,' having its premiere at the new jersey repertory company in long branch, takes a melodramatic look at the four-decade relationship between marlene dietrich and erich maria remarque.
